resources.string: GP Calc
U N I L O R I N
Hello world!
Settings
Fill Grade Details

ONE SEMESTER: 
Calculates the gp of just one semester. 

CUMULATIVE: 
Calculates your gp since first year. If all results in a semester are not out yet, you can fill in the released results and edit the semester later as more results come out. You can also use the WHAT IF function to see what your gp would have been if instead of a B, you had scored an A-and that sort of thing. 

 Alarm: 
set an alarm to ring you up everymorning as you struggle to upgrade your gp. 

ABOUT:
 Find out about the makers of this software.

TOTAL UL:
 this is the Total Unitload for the semester. 

UL:
 Unitload for each course 

SEMEST
 The semester you are calculating. 

P(Under Grades):
Pending result

 M(Under Grades):
 Missing Result 

 After entering details, scroll up to find the CALCULATE BUTTON
SEND: share your gp details with someone via sms, bluetooth, whatsapp, or even facebook (Under which case I will assume its pretty darn good!)

WHAT IF?:
 What would your GP be if instead of a C, you had made an A in so so and so course? This amazing feature allows you to see what you could have gained if you had gotten higher grades, or missed, if you had scored lower. 

 NEW SEMESTER:
 add a new semester to your cumulative gp. 

 VIEW/EDIT EXISTING: 

View the semesters you have already entered, and also edit entries in them if necessary. This would come in handy if you had made entries at a time when some results of the courses you took were yet to be released.
Touch a semester to view or edit its entries. After editing, scroll up to see and click the SAVE BUTTON

WHAT IF?:
 What would your GP be if instead of a C, you had made an A in so so and so course? This amazing feature allows you to see what you could have gained if you had gotten higher grades, or missed, if you had scored lower. 

Select a semester to get started

Fill in alarm in this format hh:mm and select AM or PM 

. DONT RING ON WEEKENDS:
 tick this to prevent your alarm from ringing you up on weekends. 

CANCEL ALARM:
touch this to cancel all set alarms.

larisoft is the trademark of all software written by Larry Okeke, a software developer with a focus on software that solves Nigerian/African specific problems.\n\n He can be reached on 07030692244 or larypetero@gmail.com
First Class! How about you give us a call , buddy (07030692244)? A conversation with a person of your talents is bound to be interesting!

Second Class Upper! Every students\' dream grade- Except for first year students, who usually think they will all graduate with first class. But time usually evaporates the illusion, doesn\'t it! Keep up the good work, buddy!

Second Class Lower! Too high to get over\.\.\. too low to get under\.\.\.you are stuck in the middle! Michael jackson probably had you in mind while making that track. Anyways, you could keep a steady boat and just graduate. There\'s more to life than shiny certificates!

Third Class! We are just not all that into this school thing or our brain has a way of rejecting everything we throw at it, right? No sweat! It won\'t hurt to poke around to see if you re interested in other things (like say Music) though

Pass! Did you make a mistake in your entries in here or did you just get what I think you got? Drop the phone, go to your room, pack your things, and go do something else with your life. Its not worth it. Am telling you. I mean; Bill Gates did it too!
B O N U S
